001package com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.currentStatus;
002
003import com.google.common.base.Preconditions;
004import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.bluetooth.Characteristic;
005import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.helpers.Bytes;
006import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.Message;
007import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.MessageType;
008import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.annotations.MessageProps;
009import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.LocalizationRequest;
010
011import java.math.BigInteger;
012
013/**
014 * Response message for {@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.LocalizationRequest}, opCode -89, size 7
015 *
016 * <br>
017 *
018 * 
019 * <table border='1'>
020 * <caption>Message properties:</caption>
021 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>opCode</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>-89</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
022 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>size</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>7</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
023 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>type</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.MessageType#RESPONSE}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
024 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>characteristic</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.bluetooth.Characteristic#CURRENT_STATUS}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
025 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>request</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.LocalizationRequest}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
026 * </table>
027 */
028@MessageProps(
029    opCode=-89,
030    size=7,
031    type=MessageType.RESPONSE,
032    characteristic=Characteristic.CURRENT_STATUS,
033    request=LocalizationRequest.class
034)
035public class LocalizationResponse extends Message {
036    
037    private int glucoseOUM;
038    private int regionSetting;
039    private int languageSelected;
040    private long languagesAvailableBitmask;
041    
042    public LocalizationResponse() {}
043    
044    public LocalizationResponse(int glucoseOUM, int regionSetting, int languageSelected, long languagesAvailableBitmask) {
045        this.cargo = buildCargo(glucoseOUM, regionSetting, languageSelected, languagesAvailableBitmask);
046        // note: these may be out of order
047        this.glucoseOUM = glucoseOUM;
048        this.regionSetting = regionSetting;
049        this.languageSelected = languageSelected;
050        this.languagesAvailableBitmask = languagesAvailableBitmask;
051        
052    }
053
054    /**
055     * <table border="1">
056     * <caption>Parsed fields for LocalizationResponse:</caption>
057     * <tr><td><code>glucoseOUM</code></td><td><code>raw[0]</code></td></tr>
058     * <tr><td><code>regionSetting</code></td><td><code>raw[1]</code></td></tr>
059     * <tr><td><code>languageSelected</code></td><td><code>raw[2]</code></td></tr>
060     * <tr><td><code>languagesAvailableBitmask</code></td><td><code>Bytes.readUint32(raw, 3)</code></td></tr>
061     * </table>
062     */
063    public void parse(byte[] raw) {
064        Preconditions.checkArgument(raw.length == props().size());
065        this.cargo = raw;
066        // note: these may be out of order
067        this.glucoseOUM = raw[0];
068        this.regionSetting = raw[1];
069        this.languageSelected = raw[2];
070        this.languagesAvailableBitmask = Bytes.readUint32(raw, 3);
071        
072    }
073
074    
075    /**
076     * <table border="1">
077     * <caption>Byte layout for LocalizationResponse.buildCargo(...):</caption>
078     * <tr><th>Offset</th><th>Description</th></tr>
079     * <tr><td>0</td><td><code>(byte) glucoseOUM</code></td></tr>
080     * <tr><td>1</td><td><code>(byte) regionSetting</code></td></tr>
081     * <tr><td>2</td><td><code>(byte) languageSelected</code></td></tr>
082     * <tr><td>3</td><td><code>toUint32(languagesAvailableBitmask) [byte 0]</code></td></tr>
083     * <tr><td>4</td><td><code>toUint32(languagesAvailableBitmask) [byte 1]</code></td></tr>
084     * <tr><td>5</td><td><code>toUint32(languagesAvailableBitmask) [byte 2]</code></td></tr>
085     * <tr><td>6</td><td><code>toUint32(languagesAvailableBitmask) [byte 3]</code></td></tr>
086     * </table>
087     */
088    public static byte[] buildCargo(int glucoseOUM, int regionSetting, int languageSelected, long languagesAvailableBitmask) {
089        return Bytes.combine(
090            // note: these may be out of order
091            new byte[]{ (byte) glucoseOUM }, 
092            new byte[]{ (byte) regionSetting }, 
093            new byte[]{ (byte) languageSelected }, 
094            Bytes.toUint32(languagesAvailableBitmask));
095    }
096    
097    public int getGlucoseOUM() {
098        return glucoseOUM;
099    }
100    public int getRegionSetting() {
101        return regionSetting;
102    }
103    public int getLanguageSelected() {
104        return languageSelected;
105    }
106    public long getLanguagesAvailableBitmask() {
107        return languagesAvailableBitmask;
108    }
109    
110}
